name: API partially implemented

transcript.content: Build the REST API for the blogging platform

[Implemented: POST /posts, GET /posts/:id]

Created the create and read endpoints. Still need to implement:
- PUT /posts/:id (update)
- DELETE /posts/:id (delete)
- GET /posts (list with filtering)
- POST /posts/:id/publish
